works.description: Private images of my wife were stolen from my computer. The images were taken by me  and are of a very private and possibly defamatory nature. I have never given permission, as the sole copyright holder, for these images to be posted or shared anywhere. This torrent has images of my wife and is, there fore, in violation of my rights as copyright holder since they are stolen. Since I never posted them online before, I cannot link to a site showing and authorized display of them.
